element.name: Zaunian
element.description:
Zaunian Ability Score Increase.Your Dexterity increases by 1, and two other ability scores each increase by 1.
Secrets of the low life.You have a keen eye for criminal undertakings and can easily spot a leader of a criminal organization.
Foreseen strikes. Due to the backstabs you have experienced in Zaun you are aware of sudden changes in the mood. You gain a bonus to initiative equal to your Proficiency Bonus. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all expended uses when you finish a long rest, and you can use it no more than once per turn.
